name: Troxia
description:
A 2D Space Adventure. 

Take the opportunity to clean up the space junk orbiting Earth.

A growing problem we must solve before it is too late. Nowadays many companies and entities try to found out the best way to get rid of space junk. 

In Troxia you should try to blast it out of orbit to enter Earth's atmosphere or to crash it into an asteroid. Alternative, you should blast it out of orbit to a point where Earth's gravity does not have any influence on it.

 The future of mankind is in your hands 

Your Mission: clean up our access road to space and give us a bright future in the Cosmos. Be a brave Troxinaut and show us the way to enjoy Universe for thousands of years to come. 

Controls:

Keyboard arrows (WASD) to move and the spacebar key to shoot.
